field.name: Administer appropriate treatment of other health conditions based on assessment
Refer children with signs of severe disease or emergencies to a health center or hospital IMMEDIATELY
Ensure child’s immunization status is up to date
Advise mother/caregiver when to return for care immediately
Advise mother/caregiver when to return for the next routine visit
Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
Proceed to assess for HIV infection, if trained
